body:
@spastorino We purposefully avoided using `#partial_path`, and deprecated it in this patch.  That's what the above discussion is about.  With this change, ActiveModel classes are not guaranteed to have a meaningful partial path which applies to all instances.  For instance, `FormHelper::FormBuilder.model_name.partial_path` is gone in this patch, replaced with an implementation of `#to_path`, because different FormBuilder instances should render different partials.

Deprecating `#partial_path` discourages authors from depending on an interface which might be nonexistent or meaningless.
